fitnessCalculator

Class PIDSimulatorFitnessCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnessCalculator.PIDSimulatorFitnessCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFitnessCalculator

    public class PIDSimulatorFitnessCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFitnessCalculator
    Implementation of the fitness calculator used to calibrate a PID controller, associate a score to a controller simulating their behavior over a fixed number of milliseconds and giving them a score based on how much they are able to follow a line.
    Author:
    Alessio Tonioni
